languages.text: After dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the first time in combat, they gain an additional +60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
languages.original_text: Нанеся {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в первый раз за бой, персонаж получает +60% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +6 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: After dealing damage for the first time in combat, they gain an additional +60% armour and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tras infligir daño por primera vez en combate, gana un +60 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y +6 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} adicionales.

languages.text: Нанеся {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в первый раз за бой, персонаж получает +60% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} и +6 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}.
languages.original_text: After dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the first time in combat, they gain an additional +60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Нанеся урон в первый раз за бой, персонаж получает +60% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g} и +6 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}.
Нанеся урон в первый раз за бой, персонаж получает +60% к {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броне{/g} и +6 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}.

languages.text: 在战斗中首次造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}之后，会额外获得+60%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与+6{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: After dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the first time in combat, they gain an additional +60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗中首次造成伤害之后，会额外获得+60%{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}与+6{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: 戦闘で初めて{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた時、追加で+60%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と+6の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: After dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the first time in combat, they gain an additional +60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘で初めてダメージを与えた時、追加で+60%の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}と+6の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Nachdem er im Kampf erstmals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht hat, erhält er zusätzlich +60 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.
languages.original_text: After dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the first time in combat, they gain an additional +60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sie im Kampf zum ersten Mal Schaden zugefügt haben, erlangen sie zusätzlich +60 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.

languages.text: Après avoir infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pour la première fois lors d'un combat, bénéficie de +60 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et +6 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: After dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the first time in combat, they gain an additional +60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir infligé des dégâts pour la première fois lors d'un combat, bénéficie de +60 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et +6 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} supplémentaires.
